formulainfo:
{{doc-special|FormulaInfo}}
The special page displays technical information about the formula, e.g. the variables it contains and information about rendering etc.
mathindex:
{{doc-special|MathIndex}}
The special page provides a user interface to the maintenance scripts to maintain the index for mathematical formulae.
wmcIntroduction: Used as introduction for the upload form
wmcWarnings: Warning that some entries were ignored during import
wmcRightSubmit: Description of the right required to view a special page.
too_manny_results: Details of an error in one specific line of submitted file. Follows {{msg-mw|wmcWarnings}}
malformatted_forumla_reference: Details of an error in one specific line of submitted file. Follows {{msg-mw|wmcWarnings}}
wrong_formula_reference: Details of an error in one specific line of submitted file. Follows {{msg-mw|wmcWarnings}}
wrong_query_reference: Details of an error in one specific line of submitted file. Follows {{msg-mw|wmcWarnings}}
